titles.title: Glory to God in the Highest

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory to God in the Highest,
And peace to His people on earth. (repeat)
(last time only) Amen, Amen!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1. Lord God Heavenly King,
Almighty God and Father,
We worship You,
We give you thanks,
We praise You for Your Glory. (chorus)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2. Lord Jesus Christ only Son of the Father,
Lord God Lamb of God,
You take away the sin of the world:
Receive our prayer. (chorus)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3. For You alone are the Holy One,
You alone are the Lord,
You alone are the Most High, Jesus Christ,
With the Holy Spirit in the Glory of God, the Father. (chorus)
